short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delay access to tempting websites for a more mindful and productive online experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing habits with Mindful Browsing â€“ the Firefox extension designed to foster self-discipline and enhance productivity. With customizable delays for tempting websites, you regain control, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.

Features:

Customizable Website Delays: Set specific time delays for any website of your choice. This helps in reducing impulsiveness and encourages you to pause and think before visiting potentially distracting sites.

Motivational Message: When attempting to visit a delayed site, receive your own reminder to yourself. This feature keeps your objectives in focus and helps resist the temptation to procrastinate.

Privacy First: The extension operates locally without sending any data externally, ensuring your browsing habits remain private and secure.
